Translations.Text: a loko pahela nuhani komana loko'e pana amara bandane juthalavya hata ane pagala kahim jhataki nakhyo hato
basa! Tene potana palanaharathi du'a kari ke hum lacara chum tum mari madada kara
basa! Ame akasana dvarane musaladhara varasadathi kholi nakhya
ane dharati manthi jharana'one vaheta kari didha. Basa! Te karya para jetalum pani mukaddara karavamam avyu hatum te nimita tha'i gayum
ane ame tene patiya ane khilavali (nauka) para savara kari didha
je amari dekharekha hethala cali rahi hati. A hato badalo te loko matejeno inkara karavamam avi rahyo hato
ane ni:Sanka ame a kis'sane nisani banavi baki rakhyo, basa! Ko'i che sikhamana prapta karanara
batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ane ni:Sanka ame kura'anane samajava mate sarala kari didhu che, basa! Ko'i che bodha grahana karanara
adani kome pana juthalavyum, basa! Batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ame temana para sakhata vavajhodum, eka bhayavaha divase mokalyum
je lokone upadi-upadine evi rite phenkatu hatum jemake mulamanthi ukhadela khajurana vrkso
batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ni:Sanka ame ame kura'anane samajava mate sarala kari didhu che, basa! Ko'i che bodha grahana karanara
samudani kome cetavani apanarane juthalavya
Ane kaheva lagya sum amara manthi eka vyaktini vatonum anusarana kari'e? Tyare to ame ni:Sanka bhula ane pagalapanamam padela ho'isum
sum amara manthi phakata tena para ja vahi utaravamam avi? Na parantu te to jutho ahankari che
have sau jani le se kale ke kona jutho ane ahankari hato
ni:Sanka ame temani kasoti mate untani mukalisum. Basa! (He saliha a.Sa.) Tame raha ju'o ane dhairya rakho
ham te'one cetavani api do ke pani te'oni vacce vahencani mate che, dareka potani vari para hajara thase
temane potana sathine bolavyo jene humalo karyo ane paga kapi nakhya
basa! Batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ame te'ona para eka avaja (bhayankara cisa) mokali. Basa! Eva tha'i gaya jeva ke kantani chundayeli vada
ame sikhamana mate kura'anane sarala kari didhu che, basa! Che ko'i je bodha grahana kare
lutani kome pana cetavani apanara'one juthalavya
ni:Sanka ame temana para pat'tharo no varasada mokalyo. Lutana gharavala sivaya temane ame saharina samaye
mara upakarathi bacavi lidha, dareka abharine ame avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka (lute) te'one amari pakadathi daravya hata. Parantu temane cetavani apanara sathe (sanka ane) jhaghado karyo
ane (luta) ne te'o'e tena mahemano vise uskerya, basa! Ame te'one andhala kari didha, (ane kahi didhu) mari yatana ane mari pakadani maja cakho
ane sacci vata che ke te'one parodhamam ja eka jgya para nakki karela yatana'e nasta kari didha
basa! Mari yatana ane cetavani'ono maja cakho
ane ni:Sanka ame kura'anane sikhamana mate sarala kari didhum che, basa! Che ko'i je bodha grahana kare
ane phira'auna ni koma pase pana cetavani apanara avya
Te loko'e amari dareka nisani'o juthalavi. Basa! Ame te'one khuba ja vijayi, takatavara pakadanarani maphaka pakadi lidha
he inkari'o! Sum tamaru inkara karavum temana inkara karava jevum nathi? Athava tamara mate agalana grarthomam chutakaro lakhelo che
athava a loko kahe che ke ame vijaya pamanaru jutha che
najikamam ja a jutha hari jase, ane pitha batavi bhagi jase
parantu kayamata no samaya tena vacana pramane che ane kayamata ghani ja sakhata ane kadavi vastu che
ni;sanka duracari geramarge ane yatanamam che
je divase te'o potana modha bhera agamam ghasadine la'i javamam avase, (ane tene kahevamam avase) jahannamani agano maja cakho
ni:Sanka ame dareka vastune eka andaja para peda kari che
ane amaro adesa phakata eka vakhata ja hoya che jemake palakavaramam
ane ame tamara jeva ghanane nasta kari didha, basa! Che ko'i sikhamana grahana karanara
je kami pana te'o'e (karmo) karya che te badhu ja karmanondhamam lakhela che
(avi ja rite) dareka nani moti vata para lakhela che
ni:Sanka amaro dara rakhanara jannato ane naheromam che
sacum pratisthanum sthana, takatavara badasaha pase
